p: Pharmacological activities: In previous studies, various biological activities including nootropic, anticonvulsant, antidepressant, antianxiety, antistress, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, antihyperlipidemic, antidiabetic, antiasthmatic, analgesic, immunomodulatory, cytotoxicity, platelet aggregation inhibitory, antimicrobial, gastroprotective and hepatoprotective of C ternatea have been documented [ 138].
